Database.Schema: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS releases(mbid STRING PRIMARY KEY,fileName STRING NOT NULL)

Queries.exists: SELECT 1 FROM releases WHERE mbid = ? LIMIT 1
Queries.update: UPDATE releases SET filename = ? WHERE mbid = ?
